txt.en: '[placeholder], my sword was recently damaged in battle and is need of repair. The White Hand uses a very strong steel for its weapons. If you could collect some of their weapons, we might be able to smelt enough good steel from their blades that we could use to repair my sword and others.\n\n'Will you do this for me?'
The White Hand Orcs were seen near the mountains to the north-west of Aldburg.\n\nÉothain has asked you to collect Orc-swords from which they might smelt steel to repair his sword and others.
Éothain is in Aldburg, south-east of the mountains.\n\nYou should bring the swords you gathered back to Éothain.
DNT - Éothain's sword was recently damaged. In order to fix it he needs the steel from the swords of Orcs to repair it.
The troubles with the Orcs require the folk of Aldburg to prepare for the inevitable war brewing upon their doorstep.
'I would normally not ask favours of others for that which I can do myself, but with all that is transpiring here in Aldburg, I knew that I would be needed here. Thank you for your assistance.'
